children.name: unbind

parameters.name: handler `Function` *(optional)*
parameters.description: The handler which should no longer be executed. If not specified all handlers listening to that event will be removed.

parameters.name: eventName `String` *(optional)*
parameters.description: The name of the event. If not specified all handlers of all events will be removed.

children.description: Remove a previously attached event handler.

children.name: trigger

parameters.name: eventData `Object`
parameters.description: Optional event data which will be passed as an argument to the event handlers.

parameters.name: eventName `String`
parameters.description: The name of the event to trigger.

children.description: Executes all handlers attached to the given event.

children.name: one

parameters.name: handler `Function`
parameters.description: A function to execute each time the event is triggered. That function should have a single parameter which will contain any event specific data.> Important: The context (`this`) of the `handler` function is set to the observable object itself.

children.description: Attaches a handler to an event. The handler is executed only once.

children.name: bind

parameters.name: handler `Function`
parameters.description: A function to execute each time the event is triggered. That function should have a single parameter which will contain any event specific data.> Important: The context (`this`) of the `handler` function is set to the observable object itself.

children.description: Attaches a handler to an event.
